title: Astragalus Chai Powder Honey Recipe - Mother Earth Living
author: Rosalee De La Forêt
description: If you're looking for an immune boost, this herbal honey is here to help!
sitename: Mother Earth Living - Healthy Life, Natural Beauty
cleaned_text: Photo by Stocksy/Chalit Saphaphak For your herbal honeys, be sure to buy from local farmers that cultivate raw honey from your area. Ingredients - 1/4 cup astragalus root powder - 1/2 tsp ginger powder - 1/2 tsp cinnamon powder - 1/4 tsp cardamom powder - 1/8 tsp clove powder - 1/2 cup raw local honey Directions - Combine all the powders together and stir well. Place in a bowl or jar with a tight-fitting lid. - Stir in the honey. Cover and label. This mixture will keep indefinitely.
